trans-unit.source: Provides a simple way to create and manage the contents of connection strings used by the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 提供簡單的方式來建立和管理使用的連接字串的內容<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The connection string builders let developers programmatically create syntactically correct connection strings, and parse and rebuild existing connection strings, using properties and methods of the class.
trans-unit.target: 連接字串產生器可讓開發人員以程式設計方式建立語法正確的連接字串，以及剖析和重建現有的連接字串，使用屬性和類別的方法。

trans-unit.source: The connection string builder provides strongly typed properties corresponding to the known key/value pairs allowed by ODBC connections, and developers can add arbitrary key/value pairs for any other connection string values.
trans-unit.target: 連接字串產生器提供強型別屬性對應到已知索引鍵/值組允許的 ODBC 連接和開發人員可以加入任何其他連接字串值的任意索引鍵/值組。

trans-unit.source: Developers needing to create connection strings as part of applications can use the OdbcConnectionStringBuilder class to build and modify connection strings.
trans-unit.target: 必須建立連接字串做為應用程式的一部分的開發人員可以使用 OdbcConnectionStringBuilder 類別來建置及修改連接字串。

trans-unit.source: The class also makes it easy to manage connection strings stored in an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 此類別也可讓您輕鬆管理儲存在應用程式組態檔中的連接字串。

trans-unit.source: OdbcConnectionStringBuilder performs checks only for the limited set of known key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: OdbcConnectionStringBuilder 只會針對一組有限的已知索引鍵/值組執行檢查。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this class can be used to create invalid connection strings.
trans-unit.target: 因此，這個類別可以用來建立無效的連接字串。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the specific known keys together with their corresponding properties within the OdbcConnectionStringBuilder class, and their default values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出特定已知的索引鍵，以及其對應的屬性內 OdbcConnectionStringBuilder 類別和其預設值。

trans-unit.source: Besides these specific values, developers can add any key/value pairs to the collection that is contained within the OdbcConnectionStringBuilder instance.
trans-unit.target: 除了這些特定值時，開發人員也可以加入的任何索引鍵/值組 OdbcConnectionStringBuilder 執行個體中包含的集合。

trans-unit.source: |Key|Property|Comment|Default value| |---------|--------------|-------------|-------------------| |Driver|<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A>|Developers should not include the braces surrounding the driver name when they set the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: |索引鍵 |屬性 |註解 |預設值 | |---------|--------------|-------------|-------------------| |驅動程式 |<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A>|開發人員不應包含大括號周圍的驅動程式名稱，當您設定這些屬性<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OdbcConnectionStringBuilder instance adds braces as needed.|Empty string| |DSN|<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Dsn%2A>||Empty string| If any value (other than the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A> value) within the connection string contains a semicolon (;), the OdbcConnectionStringBuilder surrounds the value with quotation marks in the connection string.
trans-unit.target: OdbcConnectionStringBuilder 執行個體將視需要增加大括號。 |空字串 | |DSN |<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Dsn%2A>||空字串 | 如果有任何值 (除了<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A>值) 內的連接字串包含分號 （;），則 OdbcConnectionStringBuilder 周圍加上引號的連接字串中的值。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Dsn%2A>

trans-unit.source: In order to avoid this issue with the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A> value that frequently contains a semicolon, the OdbcConnectionStringBuilder class always surrounds this value with braces.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個問題的<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A>經常包含分號，OdbcConnectionStringBuilder 類別永遠值括住這個值以括號。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ODBC specification indicates that driver values that contain semicolons must be surrounded with braces, and this class handles this for you.
trans-unit.target: ODBC 規格表示必須以括號，括住包含分號的驅動程式值，這個類別會為您處理這。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> property handles attempts to insert malicious code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>屬性控制代碼嘗試插入惡意程式碼。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code, using the default <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> property (the indexer, in C#) correctly escapes the nested key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列程式碼，使用預設<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>屬性 （C# 中為索引子） 正確逸出巢狀索引鍵/值組。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim builder As _ New System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder ' Take advantage of the Driver property. builder.Driver = "SQL Server" builder("Server") = "MyServer;NewValue=Bad" Console.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString) ``` [C#] ``` System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder(); // Take advantage of the Driver property. builder.Driver = "SQL Server"; builder["Server"] = "MyServer;NewValue=Bad"; Console.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString); ``` The result is the following connection string that handles the invalid value in a safe manner: ``` Driver={SQL Server};Server="MyServer;NewValue=Bad" ```
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim builder As _ New System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder ' Take advantage of the Driver property. builder.Driver = "SQL Server" builder("Server") = "MyServer;NewValue=Bad" Console.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString) ``` [C#]``` System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder(); // Take advantage of the Driver property. builder.Driver = "SQL Server"; builder["Server"] = "MyServer;NewValue=Bad"; Console.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString); ```結果是以安全方式處理無效值的下列連線字串︰``` Driver={SQL Server};Server="MyServer;NewValue=Bad" ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The provided connection string provides the data for the instance's internal connection information.
trans-unit.target: 提供的連接字串提供的資料執行個體的內部連接資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can pass a connection string in the constructor, or you can set the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString%2A> property explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將連接字串中建構函式，或您可以設定<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString%2A>屬性明確。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The behavior is the same either way.
trans-unit.target: 行為是相同的兩種。

trans-unit.source: The basis for the object's internal connection information.
trans-unit.target: 物件的內部連接資訊的基準。

trans-unit.source: Parsed into key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 剖析成索引鍵/值組。

trans-unit.source: The connection string is incorrectly formatted (perhaps missing the required "=" within a key/value pair).
trans-unit.target: 連接字串格式不正確 （可能遺失必要"="內的索引鍵/值組）。

trans-unit.source: Clears the contents of the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 清除的內容<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The Clear method removes all key/value pairs from the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder> and resets the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Dsn%2A> properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Clear 方法移除所有的索引鍵/值組，從<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder>並重設<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A>和<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Dsn%2A>成為其預設值的屬性。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Dsn%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The Clear method also sets the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Count%2A> property to 0 and the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString> property to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Clear 方法也會設定<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Count%2A>屬性設為 0 和<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString>屬性設為空字串。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> contains a specific key.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>包含特定索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The key to locate in the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要在中尋找的索引鍵<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> contains an element that has the specified key; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>包含具有指定的項目索引鍵，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: keyword is null ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: keyword為 null ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the ODBC driver associated with the connection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與連接相關聯的 ODBC 驅動程式的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the value passed in is null when you try to set the property, the Driver property is reset.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳入的值是 null，當您嘗試設定屬性時，會重設的驅動程式屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the value has not been set and the developer tries to retrieve the property, the return value is `String.Empty`.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定值，而且開發人員嘗試用來擷取屬性，則傳回值是`String.Empty`。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Driver" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性會對應至連接字串內的 「 驅動程式 」 索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The value of the Driver property, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_String.Empty" name="String.Empty" href=""></xref> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 驅動程式屬性的值或<xref uid="langword_csharp_String.Empty" name="String.Empty" href=""></xref>如果未提供。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the data source name (DSN) associated with the connection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與連接相關聯資料來源名稱 (DSN) 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the value passed in is null when you try to set the property, the Dsn property is reset.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳入的值是 null，當您嘗試設定屬性時，會重設資料來源名稱屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the value has not been set and the developer tries to retrieve the property, the return value is `String.Empty`.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定值，而且開發人員嘗試用來擷取屬性，則傳回值是`String.Empty`。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Dsn" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性會對應至連接字串內的"Dsn"索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The value of the Dsn property, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_String.Empty" name="String.Empty" href=""></xref> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源名稱屬性的值或<xref uid="langword_csharp_String.Empty" name="String.Empty" href=""></xref>如果未提供。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value associated with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與指定之索引鍵相關聯的值。

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，這個屬性是索引子。

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, if the specified key already exists in the dictionary, the value is replaced; otherwise, a new element is created.
trans-unit.target: 當您設定這個屬性，如果字典中已經存在指定的索引鍵時，就會取代值;否則，會建立新的項目。

trans-unit.source: The key of the item to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定項目的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The value associated with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定索引鍵相關聯的值。

trans-unit.source: The connection string is incorrectly formatted (perhaps missing the required "=" within a key/value pair).
trans-unit.target: 連接字串格式不正確 （可能遺失必要"="內的索引鍵/值組）。

trans-unit.source: keyword is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: keyword為 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the keys in the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>，包含在索引鍵<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The order of the values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is the same order as the associated values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> returned by the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的值順序<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>是關聯值中的相同順序<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>傳回<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the keys in the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>，包含在索引鍵<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Removes the entry with the specified key from the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 移除具有指定之索引鍵的項目<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Because the Remove method returns a value that indicates its success, it is not required to look for the existence of a key before trying to remove the key/value pair from the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder> instance.
trans-unit.target: Remove 方法傳回值，指出成功，因為它不需要尋找的索引鍵存在，然後再嘗試移除索引鍵/值組，從<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder>執行個體。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The key of the key/value pair to be removed from the connection string in this <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要從連接字串中移除的索引鍵/值組的索引鍵<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key existed within the connection string and was removed; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the key did not exist.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果索引鍵存在於連接字串內，而且已移除;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果索引鍵不存在。

trans-unit.source: keyword is null ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: keyword為 null ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a value corresponding to the supplied key from this <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 擷取值，對應至提供的索引鍵值，從此<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The TryGetValue method lets developers safely retrieve a value from a <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder> without needing to verify that the supplied key name is a valid key name.
trans-unit.target: TryGetValue 方法可讓開發人員安全地擷取值，以從<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder>而不需確認提供的索引鍵名稱是有效的索引鍵名稱。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Because TryGetValue does not raise an exception when you pass in a nonexistent key, you do not have to look for a key before retrieving its value.
trans-unit.target: 因為 TryGetValue 不會引發例外狀況，當您在不存在的機碼傳遞時，您不必擷取其值之前，尋找索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Calling TryGetValue with a nonexistent key places the value null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) in the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 TryGetValue 具有不存在的索引鍵會將 null 值 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 中`value`參數。

trans-unit.source: The key of the item to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之項目的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The value corresponding to `keyword.`
trans-unit.target: 若要對應的值。`keyword.`

trans-unit.source: if keyword was found within the connection string; otherwise .
trans-unit.target: 如果 keyword 連接字串中找到，否則 。
